shri lankanduye ech.ayi.wi. prathipaththiya: jiwath wima sandaha siyallanta athi ayithiya, pudgala swadhinathwaya ha surakshitha bawa, awaman sahagatha pa‡∑ärathicharayen ho daduwamin thora bawa, nithiya idiriye samana bawa, wenas kota salakimen thora wima, aththanomathika madihathwim haraha pudgalikathwayata, pawul jiwithayata wana balapamen thora bawa, sarisarime nidahasa, sewawaka nirathawime ayithiya (sewa sthanayanhi rakiyawe niratha wimata ech.ayi.wi. aasadithayanta athi ayithiya, niwasa aahara, andum palandum pilibanda pahasukam athulathwa saukhyaye ha yahapawathme nisi pa‡∑äramithin athiwa jiwathwima, labagatha haki ihalama manasika ha kayika saukhyayata athi ayithiya, adhyapanaya labimata athi ayithiya, ch.ayi.wi./eengs lingasha‡∑äritha roga pilibanda thathwayan ha aarakshitha lingika ka‡∑ärama athulu thorathuru labaganime ayithiya, mema roga pilibandawa ka‡∑äriya kirima sandaha siya hakiyawan wardhanayata athi ayithiya, pa‡∑äraja katayuthu sandaha sahabhagi wime ayithiya saha widyathmaka pa‡∑äragathinge pa‡∑ärayojana beda hada ganime ayithiya yana manawa ayithin eeta athulathya.)
